CustomField.description: SE-1109 - Populate Region based on the country.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT( ISPICKVAL( HRCFSL_Country__c , "") ),CONTAINS( $CustomMetadata.HRCFSL_Organization_Settings__mdt.HRCSVC_European_Countries.HRCFSL_Component_Detail__c , TEXT( HRCFSL_Country__c))) , "Europe" , If( ISPICKVAL( HRCFSL_Country__c , "US"), "US", If(ISPICKVAL( HRCFSL_Country__c , "CA"), "Canada", null )))
CustomField.label: Region
